original_text: And with whom was he provoked for forty years? Was it not with those who sinned, whose bodies fell in the wilderness?
korean_text: 또 하나님이 사십 년 동안 누구에게 노하셨느냐 그들의 시체가 광야에 엎드러진 범죄한 자들에게가 아니냐

sentences.original_text: And with whom was he provoked for forty years?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사십 년 동안 누구를 노하셨습니까?

sentences.original_text: Was it not with those who sinned
sentences.korean_translation: 죄를 지은 자들과 함께 하지 않았습니까?

sentences.original_text: whose bodies fell in the wilderness?
